metadata.title: CVE-2020-11653 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - low
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Varnish Cache before 6.0.6 LTS, 6.1.x and 6.2.xbefore 6.2.3, and 6.3.x before 6.3.2. It occurs when communication with aTLS termination proxy uses PROXY version 2. There can be an assertionfailure and daemon restart, which causes a performance loss.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-11653` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvarnishapi2 - 6.2.1-2ubuntu0.1
varnish - 6.2.1-2ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: varnish package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.2.1-2ubuntu0.1').
